title: Ping Blocking
body:
I always seem to get that one person who wants to fill the entire chat with pings, warnings, assistance and signals to be careful. 

But each one they'll do about four times each and do it as soon as their small ping gate opens. I know you can mute pings but that's not the greatest solution to this issue because sometimes the other 3 people on your team are actually helpful and smart with how they use this feature. 

I propose we initiate a feature that allows you to block a players pings if they are misusing this feature. The button can be right next to the mute communication button.
